name: Tigabytes
description:
Tigabytes born in January 2006 as a company dedicated to software engineering, developing web 2.0 systems for large companies. A year later, thanks to the vision of its partners, Tigabytes becomes Google's first partner in Latin America. Since 2008 and having certainty of excellence tools, Tigabytes partners decide to push the company exclusive marketing and sales of products Google.
Currently, Tigabytes is leading Google selling solutions, both in Chile and in the whole region, the position works daily to maintain
